GeochemXYDiagram.name: KS Control Diagram (Ti)
GeochemXYDiagram.Comment: Projected from Ca and Na Feldspar. Molar ratios used throughout the PER-GER ratio diagrams
Anorthite and albite have no effect on sample position (projected from).
Orthoclase control line labelled "KF", muscovite control line labelled "Mu" in the diagram
GeochemXYDiagram.Reference: Theoretical basis for PER diagrams is described in Stanley C. R., and Madeisky H. E., 1996 Lithogeochemical Exploration for Metasomatic Zones Associated with Hydrothermal Mineral Deposits Using Pearce Element Ratio Analysis
